data.title: Love our new park!
data.text:
it may have taken longer than we wanted to get completed but, it's truly a gem.
A great place to have a coffee with friends, a picnic with famil or enjoy some music during Lewisville's Sounds of Lewisville series
Beautiful

data.title: Great little park
data.text: Took forever to complete but man was it worth it.  Great community gathering place right in the middle of downtown.

data.title: Beautiful plaza
data.text: A great addition to the town. Lots of activity, water features, outdoor concerts weekly. This is a fun place for familys and new and clean.

data.title: Nicely designed city park / plaza
data.text:
This is a really lovely downtown park with large lawn areas, a concert stage, a play area for kids, native plants, a water feature, seating, and nearby restaurants. A couple of the restaurants next to the park have an exit / entry to the park. So, it could be a nice place for a picnic.
I've driven by several times since it's completion but finally stopped to check it out.  It's a very nicely designed plaza / park and seems to be a nice place to visit. When the trees get bigger, there will be nice shade.
(Downside: the H/C indicators on the walkways are too small.)
